rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Dining Area

rooms.name: Kitchen

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ground Floor)

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated fitness area with high ceilings, large windows for natural lighting, and enhanced ventilation to create an airy environment for exercise.

openings.name: Main Entrance

openings.name: Windows

openings.name: Balcony Access
